testimonials.name: Amit R.
testimonials.testimonial: I usually spend hours planning my trips, but this AI trip planner made it effortless. It curated a perfect solo adventure through Rajasthan, and even suggested offbeat spots I would've never found on my own. 10/10!

testimonials.name: Sara D.
testimonials.testimonial: Planning a family trip with kids is usually chaotic. But this tool took care of everything — kid-friendly attractions, food stops, and even nap breaks! It’s like having a personal travel assistant who gets me.

testimonials.name: John M.
testimonials.testimonial: I was nervous about navigating India, but the AI planner customized a South India itinerary that balanced culture, comfort, and cuisine. I felt confident every step of the way. Super helpful!

testimonials.name: Neha & Karan
testimonials.testimonial: We wanted a romantic yet adventurous honeymoon. The AI planned a stunning trip through Kerala with just the right mix of beaches, tea gardens, and luxury stays. Way better than any travel agent.

testimonials.name: Priya S.
testimonials.testimonial: This AI tool is a dream for backpackers. It suggested local stays, free attractions, and cheap but tasty eats. I saved money and still had the best experience ever!

testimonials.name: Carlos G.
testimonials.testimonial: I asked for a spiritual journey, and the planner delivered a route through Varanasi, Rishikesh, and Bodh Gaya — complete with meditation spots and ashram stays. Felt deeply personalized.

testimonials.name: Jessica P.
testimonials.testimonial: This AI planner helped me organize a nature-filled trip to the Himalayas. From trekking routes to hidden lakes, it tailored every detail to my love for adventure and scenic beauty. A must-try!

testimonials.name: David L.
testimonials.testimonial: As a lover of history and culture, I was looking for a unique experience in India. The AI planner set me up with an amazing cultural trail from Delhi to Jaipur, including historical sites I never knew existed!

testimonials.name: Lina M.
testimonials.testimonial: The AI trip planner gave me a seamless luxury experience in India. From private tours to 5-star hotels, everything was curated perfectly, and I didn’t have to worry about a single detail!

testimonials.name: Tom S.
testimonials.testimonial: I’m an adrenaline junkie, and this AI planner put together a thrilling adventure trip that included white-water rafting in Rishikesh and paragliding in Manali. It was an unforgettable experience!

testimonials.name: Ravi K.
testimonials.testimonial: I just needed a quick weekend getaway, and the AI planner helped me find a perfect 3-day trip to the hills of Himachal. It recommended places that I would never have thought of on my own!
